public abstract class ProtocolControlledMessenger
extends java.lang.Thread

A networking interface which uses Protocols to handle Messages

Balazs Pete

putProtocol

public void putProtocol(Protocol protocol)
Add a Protocol to handle a certain type of Message, if a previous protocol with the same message type has been added, it will be replaced

protocol - The Protocol to add

processMessage

protected Message processMessage(Message message)
                          throws InvalidMessageException
Process an input message using one of the input Protocols

Parameters:
message - The Message to process
Returns:
The response Message
Throws:
InvalidMessageException - Thrown in case the input Message cannot be handled by the interface
